name: Hummus-Stuffed Portobello Caps
author: Elizabeth
summary: This is a great party dish or appetizer, made with creamy hummus and bell pepper.
ingredients: 6  small portobello mushroom caps, stems and ribs removed
¾ cup roasted red pepper hummus
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Sear the portobello mushrooms for 3 minutes on each side until browned
Stir together cream cheese, green pepper, and hummus until evenly blended
Season the mushroom caps with salt and pepper on each side
Place the mushrooms onto a baking sheet, with the stem-side facing up
Sprinkle with lemon pepper, then fill with hummus mixture
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes until the filling is hot
